speaker: dog
dialog: Tell me, O muse, of that ingenious hero who travelled far and wide after he had sacked the famous town of Troy.

speaker: cactusboi
dialog: Many cities did he visit, and many were the nations with whose manners and customs he was acquainted.

speaker: cactusboi
dialog: Tell me, too, about all these things, O daughter of dog, from whatsoever source you may know them.
